Header.title: Empowering Sri Lankan Manufacturers
Header.paragraph: Connect with global exporters and grow your business with ExportHaven.

Features.title: Manufacturer-Exporter Matching
Features.text: Efficiently connect manufacturers with verified exporters worldwide.

Features.title: AI-Powered Demand Insights
Features.text: Use AI to forecast global demand trends and make smarter trade decisions.

Features.title: Secure Transactions & Verification
Features.text: Trust our platform for safe, verified trade transactions.

HowItWorks.title: Register & Create a Profile
HowItWorks.description: Sign up and create your exporter or manufacturer profile to get started.

HowItWorks.title: List Products or Export Needs
HowItWorks.description: Showcase your products or specify your export needs for global connections.

HowItWorks.title: Get Matched & Connect
HowItWorks.description: Our AI-powered system matches you with the right trading partners.

HowItWorks.title: Finalize Orders & Expand Your Business
HowItWorks.description: Seal the deal, expand globally, and grow your trade network with ease.

AboutUs.title: About ExportHaven
AboutUs.paragraph: ExportHaven was built with a vision to empower Sri Lankan manufacturers by seamlessly connecting them with global exporters using innovative technology.
AboutUs.mission: Empowering Sri Lankan manufacturers by connecting them with global exporters through innovative technology.
why: Many manufacturers struggle to reach international buyers.
Export logistics are complex and costly without digital solutions.
We bridge this gap with a platform that simplifies global trade.
